name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Outworld Traveler
storyline: After a nightlong respite, Kiana was pulled into the Theater of Domination, and Anti-Entropy was stricken by another crisis. The play is reaching its climax, but for whom will the curtains fall?
summary:
Version 4.9 of Honkai Impact 3rd, marking the conclusion of the Remaining Flames arc, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Prinzessin der Verurteilung! (Fischl)
• New Story Chapter XXV: Set Tomorrow Ablaze
• New Animated Short: Everlasting Flames
• New Featured Event: Outworld Quest (Genshin Impact Crossover)
• ...and more!

videos.name: Cinematic Trailer
videos.title: Animated Short [Everlasting Flames] Japanese-Dubbed Edition - Honkai Impact 3rd
